info.title: Tutors Marketplace API
info.description: API for Tutors Marketplace pet project

get.description: Returns all bookings in the system. Requires staff permissions.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

post.description:
ViewSet for admin management of all bookings.

Requires is_staff=True. Provides full CRUD access to all bookings.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific booking. Requires staff permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this booking.

post.description: Admin can cancel any pending or confirmed booking.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this booking.

post.description: Admin can mark any confirmed booking as completed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this booking.

post.description: Admin can confirm any pending booking.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this booking.

post.description: Exchange GitHub access_token for Django JWT tokens

401.description: Failed to fetch GitHub user info

post.description: Exchange Google id_token for Django JWT tokens
Login with email and password. Only available when ENABLE_CREDENTIALS_AUTH=true.
Blacklist the refresh token to logout

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Register a new user with email and password. Only available when ENABLE_CREDENTIALS_AUTH=true.

400.description: Invalid data or user already exists

post.description:
Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

get.description: Returns bookings for the authenticated user. Tutors see bookings where they are the tutor, students see their own bookings.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

post.description: Create a new booking with a tutor. Price is automatically calculated based on tutor's hourly rate.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific booking.

post.description: Cancel a pending or confirmed booking. Both tutors and students can cancel their bookings.
Mark a confirmed booking as completed. Only the tutor can complete bookings.
Confirm a pending booking. Only the tutor can confirm bookings.

get.description: Returns all chat rooms where the current user is either tutor or student.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

post.description: Creates a new chat room with a tutor or returns existing one.

get.description: Returns details of a specific chat room if the user has access.

post.description: Marks all unread messages in the chat room as read for the current user.

get.description: Returns paginated message history for the specified chat room.
get.summary: Get messages for a chat room

get.description: Returns the current user's tutor profile draft, if any.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

post.description: Creates a new draft or updates an existing one for the current user.

get.description:
ViewSet for managing tutor profile drafts.

Allows authenticated users to save and retrieve their profile drafts.
Each user can only have one draft at a time.

put.description:
ViewSet for managing tutor profile drafts.

Allows authenticated users to save and retrieve their profile drafts.
Each user can only have one draft at a time.

patch.description:
ViewSet for managing tutor profile drafts.

Allows authenticated users to save and retrieve their profile drafts.
Each user can only have one draft at a time.

post.description: Converts the current user's draft into an actual tutor profile.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all tutors with filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for name, headline, or bio

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific tutor.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this tutor.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific tutor by their slug.

post.description: Upload a file to MinIO storage. Returns the public URL.

Booking.description:
Serializer for Booking model.

Used for list and retrieve operations.

student.description: The student who made the booking

status.description:
Current status of the booking

* `pending` - Pending
* `confirmed` - Confirmed
* `cancelled` - Cancelled
* `completed` - Completed

price.description: Price at the time of booking

BookingRequest.description:
Serializer for Booking model.

Used for list and retrieve operations.

status.description:
Current status of the booking

* `pending` - Pending
* `confirmed` - Confirmed
* `cancelled` - Cancelled
* `completed` - Completed

CreateBooking.description:
Serializer for creating new bookings.

Automatically sets the student and calculates price based on tutor's hourly rate.

CreateBookingRequest.description:
Serializer for creating new bookings.

Automatically sets the student and calculates price based on tutor's hourly rate.

GitHubAuthRequest.description: Serializer for GitHub OAuth authentication request.

GoogleAuthRequest.description: Serializer for Google OAuth authentication request.

PatchedTutorDraftRequest.description:
Serializer for TutorDraft model.

Handles saving and retrieving tutor profile drafts.

data.description: Draft profile data in JSON format

Tutor.description:
Serializer for Tutor model.

Used for list and retrieve operations.

bio.description: Detailed description of the tutor's experience and approach

hourly_rate.description: Price per hour in local currency

subjects.description: List of subjects the tutor teaches

is_verified.description: Whether the tutor's credentials have been verified

TutorDetail.description:
Detailed serializer for Tutor model.

Includes additional fields for the detail view.

bio.description: Detailed description of the tutor's experience and approach

hourly_rate.description: Price per hour in local currency

subjects.description: List of subjects the tutor teaches

is_verified.description: Whether the tutor's credentials have been verified

TutorDraft.description:
Serializer for TutorDraft model.

Handles saving and retrieving tutor profile drafts.

data.description: Draft profile data in JSON format

TutorDraftRequest.description:
Serializer for TutorDraft model.

Handles saving and retrieving tutor profile drafts.

data.description: Draft profile data in JSON format

User.description: Serializer for user information returned in auth responses.

is_staff.title: Staff status
is_staff.description: Designates whether the user can log into this admin site.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
